nodes.text: Telissa was an aide to Galactic Republic Senator Uta S'orn of the Expansion Region planet Belasco prior to S'orn's resignation from the Galactic Senate in 43 BBY. When Jedi Master Qui-Gon Jinn came to visit S'orn in her office in the Senate Building on the Republic capital of Coruscant shortly before she resigned, she first mistook Jinn's knocking for Telissa's when answering the door.

Telissa was created by author Jude Watson and was first mentioned in the 2000 eleventh installment of the Jedi Apprentice young reader novel series, The Deadly Hunter. Neither Telissa's species nor gender were specified in the book.
